verbs.description: [ARGM-CAU: Why] [V: was] [ARG1: Leonard Lance] [ARG2: the only one to call directly on Trump to end this policy] ? Why not Frelinghuysen , Tom MacArthur , Chris Smith or Frank LoBiondo ?
Why was Leonard Lance [ARG0: the only one] to [V: call] [ARGM-MNR: directly] [ARG1: on Trump] [ARGM-PRP: to end this policy] ? Why not Frelinghuysen , Tom MacArthur , Chris Smith or Frank LoBiondo ?
